channel.title: Misc on Notes...
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Notes...

item.title: About
item.description:
If you have landed here, I wonder how you found your way..

How

These pages are hosted as a static site on Github, the static content which forms the pages, is generated with a Go tool called Hugo.

What

On these pages you’ll find some short posts about things, which I have taken notes to remember. These pages are for me to recall how I have done a task and are as such my “Note Book”. I happen to share them, as I hope someone else may find them useful.

Where possible I do try to give credit by references.

Why

Mainly just for my recollection, and sometime I like to write some stuff.

When

There are no schedules.

C’est la vie.
